boardgame.name: Zombicide Saison 3: Rue Morgue
Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue
Зомбицид. Улица Морг
boardgame.description: Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue is a cooperative game set in an action-movie universe for 1 to 12 players, ages 13 and up. Players control teams of survivors as they fight off a zombie horde controlled by the game itself. Survivors find weapons, battle zombies, and gain experience. The more experienced they get, the more powerful they become, but the more zombies they attract!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue introduces a terrifying new zombie type: the Skinner Zombie! Make sure you put these zombies down hard, otherwise something might come crawling for you! And don't forget Season 3's new big bad is the A-Bomb Abomination! An Abomination so twisted and mutated that its elongated arms can drag you back to it as you try to escape!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With all these new foes you're going to need to team up if you want to survive!! Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue introduces teams into the Zombicide franchise! Players pick from the largest pool of survivors in a Zombicide game yet and form teams to scavenge, loot, and kill zombies! And if you really want to shred through the shuffling dead, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll first need to make sure your team has skills that complement each other well._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue has new zombies, new weapons, new survivors, and even new team mechanics, but the biggest game changer of all is the new optional Player versus Player rule set! Yes, in Rue Morgue players' teams can go toe-to-toe to see which set of Survivors really deserve to survive! If the zombie apocalypse isn't horrifying enough for you, then prepare to face off against the deadliest foe yet: Man!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Brand new, in-shrink, ready to ship. Domestic shipping is USD $15. International will be actual cost, most likely about USD $60.
Brand new item - nothing punched out. Bought from the Kickstarter a long time ago, and no longer need it in my collection. Hopefully someone else can enjoy it

This is AT COST what I paid, everything_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s brand new. Contains EVERY EXCLUSIVE from Zombicide season 3! Up for auction is the Infected pledge from the Zombicide Season 3 Kickstarter. You will be getting everything from the Patient 0 pledge level, plus all of the exclusive optional add-on characters. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve included a picture of what is included and also listed out the optional characters that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be getting. Everything is new. You will be getting: - Zombicide: Rue Morgue - VIP Zombies #1 - Lost Zombivors - Special Yellow Dice - Special Brown Dice - Folding Dice Tower - Purple Box with All Promo Dashboards (KS Exclusive) - 1 Dice Bag - 2 Sets of 3D Barricades - Team Building Deck - Crowz _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; VIP Spawn Cards - Full Experience Deck - Pimp Weapon Cards - Rue Morgue _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Angry Neighbors Campaign (will be available as free download from CMON_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Zombicide website once finished) - Additional zombies and exclusive zombies (please see pledge image) (inside of the brown Infected Pack box) - 8 Skinner Walkers - 4 Skinner Runners - 2 Skinner Fatties - 8 Skinner Crawlers - 1 A-Bomb Zombie - 5 Zombie Crowz - 3 Seeker Zombies - 3 Seeker Zombies - 3 Seeker Zombies - 1 Female A-Bomb Zombie (KS Exclusive) - 3 VIP Zombies (KS Exclusive) - 3 VIP Zombies (KS Exclusive) - 2 VIP Zombies - 2 VIP Zombies - 2 VIP Zombies - 2 VIP Zombies - 2 VIP Zombies - Survivors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Zombivors (all KS Exclusive) (all are inside of the brown Infected Pack box, except for Audrey who has her own box) - Lucius - Cat - Jesse - Doc - Spencer - Seth - Bastian - Yuri - Kabir - Audrey You will also get all of the optional KS Exclusive characters: - Moustache Pack #2 - Patrick - Oksana - Benny - Nikki - Curro - Kris - Miss Trish There is a ton of stuff here, and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s going to be a big, heavy box. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll pack everything carefully and securely. Please feel free to ask me any questions. Thanks and good luck!

I bought Rue Morgue at the time to keep the zombie horde coming. After 6+ months of not even opening it I think it is time to sell. Still in plastic. I am also going to sell angry neighbors for those interested. Buyer pays shipping. This is not the KS edition btw.

Players control teams of survivors as they fight off a zombie horde controlled by the game itself. Survivors find weapons, battle zombies, and gain experience. With all these new foes you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re going to need to team up if you want to survive!! Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue introduces teams into the Zombicide franchise! Players pick from the largest pool of survivors in a Zombicide game yet and form teams to scavenge, loot, and kill zombies! And if you really want to shred through the shuffling dead, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll first need to make sure your team has skills that complement each other well. Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue has new zombies, new weapons, new survivors, and even new team mechanics, but the biggest game changer of all is the new optional Player versus Player rule set! Selling my Zombicide Season 3- Rue Morgue Patent 0. Main game has been opened, and cardboard pieces have been removed from sheets, but never played. All other pieces have not been opened/ still have shrink wrap. NOT the game box! ONLY: - 80 Rue Morgue Zombies! Crawler, Walker, Runner, Fatties and Abomination! + 48 Zombie Cards #145 to #192 + 12 Wounded Cards 40 Walker / 16 Runner / 15 Crawler / 8 Fatties / 1 Abomination Will Ship Worldwide! Postage Costs for Board Games and Miniatures depending on the weight of the item. Please ask for international shipment by sending your postal code, thanks. Within Germany I will use standard DHL parcel including tracking option. Of course you could choose to pick-up the goods without any additional costs. Thanks for viewing my listing, be sure to look at my other items and save on combined postage! A look inside my trade list could be helpful too because I always prefer trades before selling items.
